PerfectNetExp.abs: 狐獴(meerkats)是相当社会化的群体动物，它们会挖洞、组成地底网络洞穴，一个群落约可住40只。在同一团体中的狐獴，会互相帮 …
海岛猫鼬（meerkat），动作敏捷，也叫蒙哥，它是一种很特别的非洲动物。 最爱斑马。
动物做爱图 ... Lion 狮子 Meerkat 蒙哥 Orangutan 猩猩.

list.abs: 卡通里也有猫鼬，最有名的就是《狮子王》（The Lion King）里的丁满（Timon the meerkat）：　丁满很聪明，是辛巴的好朋友。
for the meerkat family unable to leave the desert plains , life is now really tough猫鼬一家无法离开这个沙漠平原，现在的日子过得十分艰难

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: from South African Dutch, from Dutch, long-tailed monkey', apparently from meer 'sea' + kat 'cat', but perhaps originally an alteration of an oriental word; compare with Hindi markat 'ape'

means.word_mean: 1. a mongoose-like viverrine of South Africa having a face like a lemur and only four toes

auth_sentence.content: BBC Scotland's Clive Lindsay at Hampden: Hearts scarves being sold on way to stadium say: 'Meerkat Maroons Simples'.

auth_sentence.content: The story of Swift, a five-week-old meerkat pup who has been born in one of the harshest places on Earth - the Kalahari Desert.
